name: Derrik Henry
description: I am Derrik by name,a new member here..just to give a try of my dreams.i like nature.I love my job and i am a hardworking man.My job makes me to travel round the globe.I am Happily Blessed and only seeking for the lovely woman to share my happiness with.I don’t care about race,or religion hence we could live in peace and respects each other.I like pets,and i have a dog and cat at my home.Please i am only here for something serious,if not same as you,get off me..
